ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: discretization and normalization flag_An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A method to normalize data.  In this normalization process, each value subtracts the column mean and is divided by the column standard deviation.

Concepts.definition: A method to normalize data.  In this normalization process, each value subtracts the column mean and is divided by the column standard deviation.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: No person or thing, nobody, not any.

Concepts.definition: No person or thing, nobody, not any.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An arrangement of objects side by side in a line.: To make something conform to a standard.

Concepts.definition: An arrangement of objects side by side in a line.
To make something conform to a standard; to remove useless or extraneous entries from a data set.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: An organizational header for concepts representing mostly abstract entities.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
